name: User can add a product to the cart from each detail page -- @1.2

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a user with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
When I visit the inventory page
And I click on the product with name "Sauce Labs Bike Light"
And I click on the "Add to cart" button
Then I go to the cart page
Then I should see the product "Sauce Labs Bike Light" in the cart

fullName: Detail page functionallity test: User can add a product to the cart from each detail page
